pr_title: alts: add peer attribute access for the ALTS context

timeline.message: Added Peer Attribute getter for ALTS plumbing
Added test fgor peer attribute getter and fixed handshaker integration
Added data to Test Peer Attribute map to better test equality

timeline.bodyText: Can we use a local variable instead of a static variable?
timeline.author: ZhenLian

replies.bodyText: I was not sure so I just made it static since that is what the other sample data was to test the other methods. Do you think I should make it local?
replies.author: d-reidenbach

replies.bodyText:
Yeah I think so. IMO, the reason why we want to make some test data, like TEST_RECORD_PROTOCOL, static is because these strings might be used multiple times in a place, and it's better to use a static final string to refer them, to avoid misspelling,  etc. This is similar to a const string in C++.
Map doesn't have this issue, so we'd better keep it local. However, we could make the key and value static. See my inline comments for more.
replies.author: ZhenLian

timeline.bodyText: If we define the map to be a local variable, it doesn't need to be capitalized. We usually do that for some static strings. We can also add some fake values and see if what we got equals what we expect. The key and value of that fake value could be capitalized as a static string.
timeline.author: ZhenLian

timeline.message: Fixed static variables and added a deeper map check

timeline.author: ZhenLian
ZhenLian

replies.bodyText:
Is this empty line removed?
Also, does it make sense to not initializing the map here, but moving the initialization to the place where we do SetUp()? That might make the code cleaner IMO.
replies.author: ZhenLian

replies.bodyText: Yeah that makes sense. I believe that was a fragment from when I had the map along with the static variables but good catch
replies.author: d-reidenbach

timeline.bodyText: How about this: we make the map local, but create two static string like TEST_PEER_ATTRIBUTES_KEY and TEST_PEER_ATTRIBUTES_VALUE.
timeline.author: ZhenLian

timeline.message: fixed extra line issues and static key value pair for peer attribute map testing
clean up and initialize map in setup
